title: Saudi Arabia Strengthens Leadership Role Within the International Renewable Energy Agency - SolarQuarter
snippet: - 11th December 2025 · 0 · 183 · Share · Facebook · Twitter · Pinterest · WhatsApp · Linkedin · ReddIt · Email · Print · Telegram · Copy URL · The Ministry of Energy announced that the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia has reinforced its leadership presence within the International Renewable Energy Agency (IRENA) as its newly appointed permanent representative formally submitted his credentials in Abu Dhabi.

title: World Report 2025: Saudi Arabia | Human Rights Watch
snippet: Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman has consolidated political and economic power, including as chairman of Saudi Arabia’s Public Investment Fund (PIF), a sovereign wealth fund that has facilitated and benefited from rights abuses.
